item.title: KRN Heat Exchanger and Refrigeration Ltd - Feb 2025 Earnings Call Transcript Analysis
item.description:
Earnings Call Transcript Analysis Report #

KRN Heat Exchanger & Refrigeration Limited Q3 FY25 Earnings Call Analysis #

Financial Performance #

  • Key Metrics:

    • Q3 FY25 Revenue: INR 116.36 crores (73.67% YoY increase)
    • Q3 FY25 EBITDA: INR 15.81 crores (34.76% YoY increase)
    • Q3 FY25 Net Profit: INR 13.73 crores (74.44% YoY increase)
    • 9M FY25 Total Income: INR 305.88 crores (32.96% YoY increase)
    • 9M FY25 Net Profit: INR 38.01 crores (39.02% YoY increase)

  • Comparison: Significant YoY growth in all key metrics for both Q3 and the 9-month period. Revenue and net profit showed the most substantial increases. Quarter-over-quarter comparison indicates a dip in EBITDA margins.

item.title: Blue Star Ltd:Annual Report 2023-24 Analysis
item.description:
Blue Star Ltd.: A Comprehensive Overview #

About the Company #

Year of Establishment and Founding History #

Blue Star Limited was founded in 1943 by Mohan T. Advani as a general engineering company. Initially, it was involved in air conditioning and refrigeration.

Headquarters Location and Global Presence #

Blue Star is headquartered in Mumbai, India. While primarily focused on the Indian market, Blue Star has a growing international presence, particularly in the Middle East, SAARC countries, and Africa.
